title: Is this patent for a triangular spacecraft real (US20060145019A1)? - Quora

response.answer_text: First, it’s a patent application, not a patent. It’s real, in the sense that some guy paid the fees to file it. But I wouldn’t say it’s real, in the sense that the invention described in the application works. Notably, the application went abandoned a couple years after filing, due to the applicant not responding to the patent examiner’s rejection. In turn, the examiner’s rejection primarily involved the claims being unclear.

The TR-3B is a real Spacecraft. The one I saw in 1994 was only traveling about 30 mph and 300 ft from tip to tip. I can’t fathom why or how this black budget $3 billion project made it to light this way. What’s important is that it did. Now we the taxpayers can file a freedom of information act requesting everything about it. This particular project was in progress way back in 1992 and definately flying in 1994. I can only imagine what kind of space missions it had.
